name: Tower of Dice
description:
Join Hit Knight on their quest to defeat mummies, bats and mages while trying to descend to the 11th floor of the Tower of Dice, armed with nothing but their fists and the power luck.

Controls:

Move: WASD / Arrow Keys
Stop the dice: Spacebar

Credits:
Background and Tileset Artist: disemq
Character Design and Animation: NGZ0NE
Composer: edarg_py
UI, FX and assets artist: Smash_TS
Programmer: GJDZ
